description: Love everything about it. My only complaint is that there's no way to make completed tasks stay. Currently, if I check a task off, and make another, the checked off one automatically deletes. It would be nice if that feature was able to be toggled.

Great app!

To those who ask about the requirement for a Google account. how else, can it sync between your computer and phone?

In my case, this app syncs between my personal GNU/Linux laptop, my office Windows laptop and my Android mobile phone.

A Google account, IMO, is the most practical way to sync between multiple devices.

Please correct, if I am wrong and let me know of an easier way to sync.

When it starts it asks me to login to Google.
I have no Google account, why is this expecting me to have one?

I'd suggest the author to make it work without a Google account or, at the very least, put Google somewhere in the description so people won't waste time.
Not a real app if all you get when you open it is a Google Sign in button.
